Do they work for macs
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): DexDrive, SharkPort/X-Port, Max Drive Information: Public Questions: DexDrive, SharkPort/X-Port, Max Drive Inquries: Do they work for macs
By bobo2047 on Thursday, March 28, 2002 - 10:10 pm:

do they?

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, March 28, 2002 - 10:33 pm:

The Dex Drive is not compatible with Mac, even under virtual PC. (it also uses a serial port, which most Macs do not have)

SharkPort and X-Port are not compatible with Mac, even under Virtual PC.

The Max Drive is compaible with Macs running Virtual PC, as long as you have a USB port on your computer.
